subject: Congrats on AI Powered List by BI | Dheeraj Full Stack Job Application
body:
Hello Dr. Shiv,
I hope I have a minute of your valuable time. I was awestruck by how you
left your cardiology practice because you saw technology's potential to
help more people than you could ever see in your weekly clinic.This is
exactly why I felt compelled to reach out to you about getting a chance to
work with Abridge.
Quick background:

   - Currently: Building 3D Diffusion models for breast cancer detection at
   Stony Brook University Hospital with Prof. Klaus Mueller.
   - Past: This summer 2024, I was Engineer #1 at Stock68
   <http://www.stock68.com/> (Brooklyn, NYC), where I built a real-time
   supply tracking system with Harvard Business School alums.
   - Education: CS Grad Student (Stony Brook), Bachelors in Data Science
   (IIT Madras)


I would be incredibly grateful for even 15 minutes of your time to discuss
how I could contribute to Abridge's mission. I understand you must be
extremely busy, but any opportunity to connect would mean a lot to me.

Thanks a lot for your time and consideration.

Best regards,
Dheeraj Mukirala
934-63-1424

subject: Quick catch-up
body:
Dear Sarthak,

Hope this email finds you well. I'm Dheeraj Mukirala, and we crossed paths
during our IITM days when I was Secretary of Nallamala House and you were
mentoring Kaziranga House. I remember us being in the first ever Upper
House Council and how you used to bring innovative ideas to the table. Your
work with fprime.AI caught my attention, and I'd love to explore how I
might contribute to your mission in AI.

A quick update on my journey:

   - Completed my BSc from IITM last year
   - Currently a CS graduate student at Stony Brook University, New York.
   - Working as a Research Assistant with Prof. Klaus Mueller on Medical
   Image Synthesis using Generative Models with a special focus on Breast
   Cancers.
   - Just wrapping up my summer as Intern #1 at Stock68 in Brooklyn, a
   pre-seed stage startup founded by Harvard Business School alums.

Given our shared IITM background and my growing experience in AI, I'm
excited about the possibility of contributing to the innovative work at
fprime.AI. Would you be open to a brief discussion about potential
opportunities or collaborations?

Looking forward to reconnecting and in case you make some free time, please
let me know if we could have a quick virtual chat. I am also attaching my
resume to this email for your reference.

Best regards,
Dheeraj Mukirala
934-263-1424

alum startup. My experience aligns well with your requirements:

subject: Software Engineer Internship at OpenQQuantify
body:
Good evening,

First of all, I am grateful to you for taking time out of your busy
schedule to view my application. Following my application on Linkedin, I
researched about leveraging AI for Quantum Applications and was quite
impressed by your website. I have 2 years of professional work experience
in Backend Technologies like Node js, Express js and MERN stack.

I am a Computer Science graduate student at Stony Brook University, with a
focus on Wordpress, Python, SQL and React. My fascination with computers
dates back to my participation in a Student Exchange program at Saitama
University, Tokyo, Japan, where I was one of 8 students selected from a
pool of 0.5 million candidates at the age of 16. My journey through my
undergraduate studies has molded me into a humble learner, always eager to
grow from my mistakes.

I firmly believe that I am very well equipped and have practical
understanding of REST API's, Flask, Python and Firebase and hence would be
a great fit for this position.

I am based in New York, and am available to commit a full-time internship
and can relocate to anywhere in the US. I am attaching my resume for your
consideration below.

Thank you once again for considering my application. It truly means a lot
to me. Please schedule a quick call with me to discuss our mutual interests
and see if I'd be a fit for your team.

Thanks and Regards,
Dheeraj Mukirala

subject: AI Internship Application
body:
Good Morning,

Thanks for taking out your time to open my email. My name is Dheeraj
Mukirala, a CS graduate student at Stony Brook University, and I'm reaching
out to express my keen interest in the AI intern position at Eve.

With a solid foundation in Python, Pytorch, NLP, and 2 years of
professional experience in the Data science field, I have deployed machine
learning pipelines in my previous organization and I also have experience
with Slurm and Job scheduling for high accuracy parallel tasks. I have a
bachelor's in Data Science from IIT Madras, which is India's toughest
engineering school to get into and is ranked No.1.

I believe my technical skills and passion for impactful projects align
perfectly with Eve's meaningful cause. I am located in Brooklyn, New York
City and I believe that I'd be a right fit for this position.

I am enthusiastic about contributing to Eveâ€™s mission of providing
companionship for senior citizens and people living alone.

Thank you for considering my application. I am looking forward to the
opportunity to discuss how I can contribute to your team.

You can find my GitHub repository here for a review of my work:
https://github.com/mukiralad
My research work can be found here:
https://scholar.google.com/citations?hl=en&user=Pz8YPjds8yAC

Warm regards,
Dheeraj Mukirala

subject: Summer Research Assistant (Master's Student)
body:
Dear Professor Abbeel,

I'm Dheeraj Mukirala, a CS Master's student at Stony Brook University,
currently working on Multi-Conditioned Denoising Diffusion Probabilistic
Models and LLMs under Prof. Klaus Mueller
<https://www3.cs.stonybrook.edu/~mueller/>.

Iâ€™ve admired your work since discussing it with Aravind Srinivas, whom
you've advised for his PhD at Berkeley. We share an alma mater in India,
IIT Madras, where he spoke highly of you.

Your work in AI, especially at BAIR, aligns closely with my research
interests. I hope we could find a moment for a brief conversation to
discuss potential collaboration opportunities this summer. Iâ€™m keen to
contribute and absorb as much as I can.

I am primarily driven by a passion to be at the forefront of the Deep
Learning and Reinforcement Learning revolution. I am not seeking a paid
internship. My primary interest lies in the opportunity to learn under your
guidance.

Thank you for considering my request. I look forward to the possibility of
collaborating.

Best regards,
Dheeraj Mukirala
+1 934 263 1424

subject: USAA IT Internship Follow Up
body:
Hello Dheeraj
      Mukirala , Thank you for applying to USAAâ€™s IT Internship Requisition
      #R0095570. In your application, you indicated that you did not require immigration
      support and that you are authorized to work in the US. Would you please re-confirm
      your current immigration status (e.g., F-1 student, US citizen, permanent resident,
      etc.)? One of our program goals is to convert our interns to full-time
      employment. Therefore, we want to ensure that this future conversion and maintenance
      of employment is possible without work visa sponsorship now or in the future. Please
      respond to me directly as soon as possible at brenda.balderas@usaa.com Thanks
      again, Brenda Balderas USAA University Relations brenda.balderas@usaa.com This email was intended for dheeraj.mukirala@stonybrook.edu

subject: Summer Internship Inquiry
body:
Dear Professor,

I hope this email finds you well. I'm Dheeraj Mukirala, and we crossed
paths during the Design Thinking course at IIT Madras, where my team
presented an Indian version of the Taskrabbit app during the viva voice
session on December 15, 2023. Your encouragement and recognition led our
project to be showcased as one of the best that semester, an achievement I
deeply appreciate.

I'm currently pursuing my Master's in Computer Science at Stony Brook
University, NY. After finishing my bachelor's degree in Data Science from
IIT Madras, I am now on the lookout for a challenging technical stint this
summer.

I would be honored to discuss the possibility of working with you further
and explore how I can contribute to your ongoing projects or research
initiatives.

Please let me know if there are any opportunities available for a summer
internship or if there is a possibility of accommodating me within your
team.

I am attaching my resume to his email for your reference and I look forward
to the potential of working together.

Thanks and regards,
Dheeraj Mukirala

subject: Expression of strong interest for Data Project Assistant Role
body:
Very good evening,

I'm Dheeraj Mukirala, a Computer Science graduate student at SBU, with a
strong Data Science background from IIT Madras, India. I've recently
applied for the Data Project Assistant position at Stony Brook University
on Handshake and am eager to express my genuine interest in contributing to
the Department of Biomedical Informatics.

With expertise in Python, R, SQL, and hands-on experience in statistics,
machine learning, and Spark, I am well-prepared for the challenges of
developing and deploying big data analytics for electronic health record
data.

I have the necessary work authorization and would be pleased to discuss how
my skills align with the goals of the department in a brief interview.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the
opportunity. I am also attaching my resume for your reference.

Sincerely,
Dheeraj Mukirala
+1 934 263 1424
Chapin Apartments, Opposite Hospital
700 Health Sciences Dr.
